articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian People's Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian People's Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with the delegation of the Mongolian People's Party led by Secretary General Munkhbat Jamiyan which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 The secretary general said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties are the most solid relations and continuing to develop on good terms while overcoming the hardships of history.
					
					 During his stay in the DPRK, he witnessed successes made by it and came to know well about the industrious Korean people and their powerful potentials to build a thriving socialist nation, he noted.  
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in the struggle for the prosperity of the country under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Yemen
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Yemen
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi, president of Yemen, on the occasion of its national day.
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future and wished the president and people of Yemen greater success in their work to achieve the security and stability of the country and economic prosperity.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Crimes Committed by "Yusin" Dictatorial Regime Demanded
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Crimes Committed by "Yusin" Dictatorial Regime Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of south Korea recently declared not guilty those related to the "Liberation Strategic Party Case" that was fabricated decades ago.
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 1063 issued on Thursday said the verdict of not guilty passed on those related to the case by the Supreme Court is a living proof showing how groundless and ridiculous the spy cases fabricated by the fascist puppet group were.
					
					 The above-said case is one of a number of conspiratorial cases cooked up by traitor Park Chung-hee to maintain "yusin" fascist dictatorship.
					
					 More than three decades have passed since Park Chung-hee met his end but a great number of spy cases fabricated by the "yusin" fascist "regime" still remain pending clarification in south Korea.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the puppet group is keen on cooking up more spy cases including attempted rebellion case to justify the revival of fascist dictatorship and its unpopular rule and escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The fascist suppression of progressive political parties, organizations and figures perpetrated by the puppet group amid the whirlwind of "eliminating forces following the north" far surpasses the crackdown in the "yusin" dictatorial days in its ferocity and barbarity.
					
					 Finding itself in the worst ruling crisis, the puppet group is kicking up fascist frenzy in its desperate bid to prolong its remaining days but this will only precipitate its miserable doom.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life should thoroughly probe the truth behind all evil doings and crimes committed by the "yusin" dictatorial "regime" in the past and sternly punish the puppet conservative group, a root cause of all misfortunes.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Secretary General of Mongolian People's Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Secretary General of Mongolian People's Party
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Munkhbat Jamiyan, secretary general of the Mongolian People's Party, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday by the secretary general who is heading the delegation of the Mongolian People's Party.

articles.title: Mongolian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Mongolian Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Mongolian People's Party led by Secretary General Munkhbat Jamiyan visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round historic relics preserved with much care there, being briefed on the story of the old home of the President.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that his visit to the historic place where Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood offered an opportunity to know well about the great life of family members in Mangyongdae who waged a sacred struggle for the freedom and independence generation after generation.
					
					 The delegation toured the Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: 60th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Kumsong Youth Publishing House, Paper Chongnyon Jonwi Marked
articles.content:
60th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Kumsong Youth Publishing House, Paper Chongnyon Jonwi Marked 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Kumsong Youth Publishing House and the paper Chongnyon Jonwi marked the 60th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to them. 
					 He visited the paper Minju Chongnyon, predecessor of the Kumsong Youth Publishing House and the paper Chongnyon Jonwi on May 22, Juche 43 (1954) and gave important instructions which would serve as the guidelines in building media for youth and children. 
					
					 He clarified the fundamental issues of building and developing media for youth and children into media of the leader and the party from A to Z, including the issue of editing well stories about the childhood of President Kim Il Sung, the issue of carrying stories about the struggle of members of the anti-Japanese children corps. 
					
					 He stressed the need to edit many stories about Children's Union members' brave struggle against the enemies during the Fatherland Liberation War and stories of members of the Children's Union who were setting an example in the study and organizational life. 
					
					 Meetings took place on Thursday. 
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, officials, journalists, editors and employees of the Kumsong Youth Publishing House and the paper Chongnyon Jonwi.

articles.title: Monument to Victorious Musan Area Battle Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Monument to Victorious Musan Area Battle Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Taehongdan, May 22 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel and people is visiting the Monument to Victorious Musan Area Battle where the statue of President Kim Il Sung is standing on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victorious Musan area battle.
					 The monument was erected on Taehongdan tableland of Mt. Paektu area on May 23, Juche 91 (2002). It has been visited by more than 1.4 million service personnel, people from all walks of life including those of Kim Il Sung University, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, Sangwon Cement Complex and Hamhung University of Pharmacology and school youth and children for the past 12 years.
					
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute to it.
					
					 They looked round a sculpture in relief depicting anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who conducted positive military and political activities during the then advance toward Musan area, a group of large-size subsidiary theme sculptures in relief showing the indomitable struggle of anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners with ardent patriotism, people reclaiming tableland and the present-day happy life of the people in Taehongdan, the Tower of Rifle depicting a rifle with a bayonet and a monument to the revolutionary activities.
					
					 They held before the Monument meetings to hear impressions of undying revolutionary exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerillas, poem recital, etc.

articles.title: "Star of Korea", First Multi-part Film Portraying Leader in DPRK
articles.content:
"Star of Korea", First Multi-part Film Portraying Leader in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Feature film "Star of Korea" is the first multi-part film of cyclic form portraying the leader in the DPRK. The film was produced with the revolutionary hymn "Start of Korea" as its theme music.
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il formulated the artistic representation of leader as the essence of building the Juche-based literature, and initiated the production of this film on the basis of "Star of Korea", a song young communists created and disseminated in praise of President Kim Il Sung in the early period of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The ten-part film is set against the background of the period between the1920s and 1930s (the period of anti-Japanese armed struggle in Korea), and vividly represents part of the history of activities of Kim Il Sung, who paved the path of the Korean revolution under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The film shows the greatness and noble traits of the President who saved the Korean revolution from a crisis and led it to a fresh upsurge with his firm independent stand and indomitable will. And it tells about the spirit the young Korean revolutionaries displayed to devotedly defend their leader and carry out the Juche-based lines and policies advanced by him for the Korean revolution.
					
					 It also deals with the high sense of obligation and comradeship of the young revolutionaries closely united around their leader and the devoted efforts made by Kim Il Sung to rally the nationalists around the anti-Japanese national united front, realize the alliance with the Chinese anti-Japanese nationalist units and lead the Korean people's anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 The production of this film was of weighty significance in carrying out the Workers' Party of Korea's literary and art policy.

articles.title: DPRK Makes Good Hauls on West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Makes Good Hauls on West Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's fishery stations on the west coast of the country are now making good hauls.
					 Typical of them is the Nampho Fishery Station, which has registered gratifying results in hitting this year's fishing goal, set 2.5 times higher than last year's. 
					
					 All its fishing boats, equipped with various kinds of nets, turned out in increasing the haul.
					
					 As of mid-May, the station caught several hundred more tons of fish than the figure in last year's corresponding period.
					
					 Its manager, Kang Kyong Su, told KCNA:
					
					 The success in fishing depends on ensuring the repair of boats in time and preparing fishing tackles in a responsible manner.
					
					 My station has carried on the work to remodel fishing boats while repairing them in order to equip them with more fishing nets.
					
					 It also paid attention to providing in addition motors of small output to the fishing boats to reduce their fuel consumption. 
					
					 We will drastically raise the number of outings for fishing and the amount of draught and introduce the advanced halieutics to make big hauls this year.

articles.title: DPRK Children Enjoy at Songdowon Camp
articles.content:
DPRK Children Enjoy at Songdowon Camp
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren of the DPRK are now enjoying themselves at the remodeled Songdowon International Children's Camp on the east coast of the country.
					 The gymnasium, indoor swimming pool and other parts of the camp are always crowded with its campers.
					
					 Ri Myong Gyong, a third-year student of Hamhung Foreign Languages School, told KCNA that she was reluctant to leave the wading pool though she played there for more than two hours.
					
					 So Kwang Hyok, a third-year student of the Orphans' Secondary School in Taean District, Nampho City, said after playing basketball in the gym his body and mind have grown during the camping.
					
					 Kim Yong Ok, a teacher of the camp, said:
					
					 The campers are enjoying all blessings. At those happy children's looks, I can see the rosy future of my socialist country to be more prosperous.
					
					 I will fulfill my duty as an educator to make the campers deeply feel and repay the loving care shown by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Crackdown on Bereaved Families Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Crackdown on Bereaved Families Censured
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed on May 19 that the south Korean police were shadowing representatives of families of victims active for the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol tragedy and the punishment of those responsible, according to south Korean media reports.
					Over 30 representatives of the families of victims found suspicious men following them in Kochang, North Jolla Province when they were on their way to Phaengmok Port on Jin Island, South Jolla Province to hold a meeting over the deceptive "talk to the people" made public by Park Geun Hye.
					
					Recognizing them as detectives belonging to the intelligence department of the Tanwon police station in Ansan, Kyonggi province, the bereaved family members questioned about their identities but they shamelessly claimed that they were not police officers.
					
					So, over 10 of the group took the two men to Ansan from where they staged a protest.
					
					Much upset by this, the director of the Kyonggi District Police Agency and the chief of the Tanwon Police Station made an apology before bereaved families, making poor excuses that police action was not prompted by an evil intention and it was aimed to help bereaved families, afraid of the happening of anything undesirable.
					
					It is not the first time that police resorted to suppression after the occurrence of the accident. It deployed plainclothes police officers in Jindo Gymnasium where families of victims put up, throwing a network of strict watch.
					
					When families of victims enraged by the delayed rescue of those missing were about to get on the bus to go to Chongwadae to talk to Park Geun Hye, a group of police officers who were on standby nearby stopped them.
					
					As they set out to go to Chongwadae even on foot, even the deputy chief of the puppet Police Agency came out to stop them, shouting hoarse that it was illegal to go to Seoul.
					
					Despite this police suppression, the families of victims went to Seoul and rushed to Chongwadae, shouting "government is murderer!", "Park Geun Hye, hold responsibility!" and "Bring children to life!".
					
					Much upset by this, the puppet group set in motion lots of police force to throw a cordon around Chongwadae and coldly treated them.
					
					As seen above, the puppet group is keen to calm down the protest of the families of the victims of the tragedy and quell the public anger running high across society.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds Park Geun Hye Group accountable for Ferry Tragedy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds Park Geun Hye Group accountable for Ferry Tragedy 
						
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The ferry Sewol disaster was a reflection of the corrupt and ailing society of south Korea where lives of people are regarded as not worth a fly and the clear revelation of the incompetence and unpopular politics of the Park Geun Hye group, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 What Park Geun Hye did after taking "presidential office" through frauds and gimmicks was nothing but throwing away her election commitments like a pair of old shoes and mercilessly suppressing those people who struggled for their right to existence by reviving the "yusin" dictatorial system. 
					
					 The Park group has turned the south Korean society into a corrupt one where money is everything, turning a deaf ear to the demand of people and siding with the plutocrats. It is, therefore, out of question that it would care for the lives and security of the people. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye held a meeting of senior secretaries of Chongwadae six days after the ferry Sewol sank and admitted herself that "a system for dealing with the crisis did not operate at all."
					
					 Like a thief being afraid of his own shadow, Park vociferated about "responsibility of public officials" and played a trick to divert elsewhere the public criticism of her group. She tried to put a gag on progressive media under the pretext of "checking the spread of false rumors". 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is now busy creating a horror-ridden atmosphere of suppression threatening the people who turned out in the actions, shouting slogans "Park Geun Hye step down". 
					
					 However, this is nothing but the last-ditch effort of the murderers driven into the worst crisis in a bid to prolong their remaining days. 
					
					 Those who turn their backs on the people are sure to be forsaken by them and the Park group of traitors will only precipitate the day they will be judged by history.

articles.title: Demo Staged against Authorities' Crackdown in Seoul
articles.content:
Demo Staged against Authorities' Crackdown in Seoul
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Young people in their twenties held a demo in Seoul on May 19 in protest against the puppet authorities' crackdown, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 Prior to the demo, speakers denounced the puppet authorities for violently walking away the civilians who staged a street march to honor the memory of the victims of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster and threatening to take legal actions against them.
					
					 They held that the authorities' such crackdown is little short of pressurizing the civilians calling for probing the truth behind the sinking disaster and punishing those responsible for it to "stay calm".
					
					 They declared they turned out in the demo as they could not repress their anger at Park Geun Hye who made public a "talk to the people" while keeping more than 200 civilians in custody.
					
					 As the youngsters launched their demo, the puppet policemen pounced upon them to block it.
					
					 Saying that they were infuriated by the authorities' crackdown, they declared they would not stay calm in order to probe the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.

articles.title: Members of Teachers' Union Hold Anti-"government" Rally in S. Korea
articles.content:
Members of Teachers' Union Hold Anti-"government" Rally in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- More than 6 000 members of the National Teachers Union of south Korea held a rally in Sodaemun district of Seoul condemning the puppet regime for its failure to cope with the ferry Sewol tragedy, according to the south Korean Internet paper Voice of People on May 17.
					 The speakers said at the rally that more than a month has passed since the ferry Sewol disaster occurred but what Park has shown was nothing but orchestrated sympathy and formal apology.
					
					 The only thing which Park Geun Hye did at the crucial time right after the occurrence of the accident when it was quite possible to rescue students was that she blamed public official servants, they noted.
					
					 They criticized the present regime for using its power not for saving the lives of the people but for helping capitalists meet their unlimited interests.
					
					 They said: We can no longer remain a passive onlooker to the society in which capital is put above human lives, no one is responsible for them and poor and weak people fall down, and will fight out till the truth about the accident is thoroughly probed and those responsible for it are punished. The teachers will take the lead in the actions for forcing the corrupt and incompetent "regime" to step down.
					
					 That day the participants of the rally issued a declaration urging the "regime" to form a committee for probing the truth behind the ferry disaster led by non-governmental organizations, institute a special law on it, take basic steps for preventing the recurrence of disasters and protecting the lives and safety of the people and stop the education for killing children. 
					
					 At the end of the rally, the participants staged a demo.
					
					 On the same day, members of the National Teachers Union took part in an anti-"government" candlelight rally in Chongye plaza in Seoul and bitterly condemned the Park group for causing the horrible tragedy of burying hundreds of students at seabed.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Resignation of Park Geun Hye 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A joint council made up of civic and social organizations of south Korea for the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol tragedy and punishment of those responsible released a statement on May 19 demanding the resignation of the puppet chief executive, according to Jaju Minbo, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 It is the demand of the people that Park Geun Hye should step down, taking the responsibility for the failure to save more than 300 passengers, the statement said.
					
					 Querying whether the disbandment of the maritime police and downplaying of the role of the Ministry of Security and Administration proposed by Park can settle everything, the statement said it is not possible to calm down the souls of the dead and prevent the recurrence of the similar disaster unless the murderers are punished.
					
					 Park eased all kinds of regulations related to the lives and security of the people and de-nationalized public fields, bringing profits to big businesses.
					
					 It is hypocrisy on the part of the "government" that it feels responsible for the tragedy as it walked away those citizens who honored the memory of the victims and urged the authorities to take responsibility. 
					
					 Park should step down for the genuine settlement of the Sewol tragedy, it held.

articles.title: S. Korean Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye of Defaming Spirit of May 18 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Papers Accuse Park Geun Hye of Defaming Spirit of May 18 Popular Uprising 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on May 18 carried an editorial denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for defaming the spirit of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The May 18 movement for democracy constitutes a core in the history of the struggle for democracy and "March for Dear Ones" is the song loved by the people in the protracted struggle for demanding a probe into the truth about the suppression of the Kwangju uprising and the punishment of those responsible for it. 
					
					 But the present regime didn't allow people to sing the song at an event for commemorating the 34th anniversary of the May 18 movement for democracy.
					
					 The "prime minister" made reckless remarks that a "resolution of the National Assembly is not a recommendation" and a "mistake may lead to the division of public opinion as there is a strong opposition to designation of commemorative song."
					
					 It is necessary to make regulations for putting those intentionally defaming the May 18 spirit under control.
					
					 On the same day, the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial said that the ceremony for marking the 34th anniversary of the May 18 movement for democracy held in Kwangju on May 18 fully showed that the May 18 spirit is being defamed under the Park "regime."
					
					 The regime sent members of conservative organizations and riff-raffs to the venue of the ceremony, making it a mayhem, the editorial noted, adding that bereaved families of the victims of the Kwangju uprising deplored what value the regime seeks to defend by using those disguised as mourners.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Open to Public Information about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Open to Public Information about Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea held a press conference around Chongwadae on May 19 demanding the puppet authorities open to public information about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 It demanded the authorities open to public communications among the disaster measure headquarters, maritime police and media on the ferry sinking, reports, contents of reports made to Park Geun Hye and Kim Jang Su, original sailing records, etc. The authorities should show information about the maritime police's rescue operation, data on the check-up of security of the ferry and cargo loading, papers allowing sailing, composition of the joint investigation headquarters and results of investigation into the captain and crewmen, the organization held.
					
					 It also demanded the authorities open to public documents related to the decision of the present regime's policy on easing regulations including the norms for operating the ship security management system.
					
					 It warned that if the regime refuses to accept these demands, the organization would opt for legal actions including administrative action.

articles.title: Number of Unemployed on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Number of Unemployed on Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The number of the jobless is on the steady increase in south Korea, Yonhap News of south Korea said.
					 The number of jobless people in south Korea this April was more than treble the official data made public by the puppet authorities.
					
					 This gives the lie to the authorities' claim that job opportunities are getting better these days.

articles.title: Korean Women in U.S. Urge Park Geun Hye to Step down
articles.content:
Korean Women in U.S. Urge Park Geun Hye to Step down
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Korean women in the United States are dynamically launching actions across the U.S. demanding Park Geun Hye bear responsibility for the ferry Sewol sinking disaster and step down, according to Minjok Thongsin, the internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. 
					  At least 300 Korean women in the U.S. gathered in front of the south Korean consulate general in Los Angeles on May 10. They said the ferry disaster was intolerable and that Park Geun Hye should bear the largest responsibility for the disaster. 
					
					  Advertisements denouncing the group of Park Geun Hye were carried in The New York Times and the Washington Post by the fund-raising campaign of Koreans in different parts of the U.S. conducted according to the call of Korean women in the U.S. 
					
					 Korean women also took the lead in the struggle staged under the slogan "Park Geun Hye, step down!" in 38 cities including Washington, New York, Los Angeles, Boston, Chicago, Atlanta and Philadelphia from May 16 to 18. 
					
					 Heard in the venues of the struggle were voices of indignation of Korean women in the U.S.
					
					 They are hardening their will to fight it out to probe the truth about the disaster and punish those responsible for it, positively supporting the struggle of the people from all walks of life in south Korea demanding the resignation of Park.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Blame Park Geun Hye for Sewol Sinking Disaster
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Blame Park Geun Hye for Sewol Sinking Disaster
 Tokyo, May 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Tuesday urging the Park Geun Hye group to step down for causing the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, declared that the Sewol sinking disaster was a tragedy of the century caused by the south Korean society torn with the unpopular evil politics of the puppet reactionary ruling forces only seeking their own luxury and political greed indifferent to the people's life and safety, mammonism and frauds and irregularities and an unprecedented hideous one.
					
					 Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Hokkaido Headquarters of Chongryon, said that actions denouncing the Park Geun Hye "regime" for causing the Sewol sinking disaster are under way across south Korea and the south Korean media is also calling for the Park's resignation.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairman of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that history records a lot of sinking accidents but knows no such disaster and massacre as Sewol sinking tragedy.
					
					 He stressed that Park can never evade the responsibility for the massacre but deserves a stern judgment by history.
					
					 Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, asserted that south Korea is a tundra of human rights ruthlessly violating the elementary rights of the people and Park Geun Hye, the kingpin of human rights abuses, should be eliminated.

articles.title: Punishment Should Be Meted Out to Park Geun Hye Group: Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Punishment Should Be Meted Out to Park Geun Hye Group: Chongryon Officials
 Tokyo, May 20 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of organizations under the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on May 19 denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for turning the whole of south Korea into a mourners' house by causing the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said the Sewol tragedy clearly proved that the south Korean authorities were only keen on gratifying their political greed in utter disregard of the lives and security of the people.
					
					 He denounced the Park group's sycophantic and traitorous moves of making desperate efforts to get rid of the pretty fix by mocking at the people, turning its back on them and relying on outsiders even though it perpetrated the hideous tragedy.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth league in Japan, said that if Park is allowed to remain in office as now, more innocent south Koreans will meet deaths, stressing severe punishment should be meted out to the Park group.
					
					 Jo Han Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, said the monstrous atrocity committed by the Park group was an unprecedented crime against humanity and a hideous massacre that shocked the world. 
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said the recent massacre was caused by the Park group which is only keen on prolonging its days by kowtowing to its American master, not caring whether people die or not, strongly demanding Park step down immediately in the name of all Korean women.
					
					 Ri Thae Il, chairman of the Korean Students Committee in Japan, said as long as sycophantic traitor and war maniac Park is allowed to stay in power, south Koreans can never escape misfortune and disgrace.

articles.title: Education Officials of Chongryon Slam Park Geun Hye Regime for Its Unethical Atrocity
articles.content:
Education Officials of Chongryon Slam Park Geun Hye Regime for Its Unethical Atrocity 
						
 Tokyo, May 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- Education officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on May 20 issued statements condemning the Park Geun Hye regime for killing students.
					 Kim Yun Son, principal of Osaka Korean High School, said:
					
					 I can hardly repress the surging indignation at the regime's inhuman and unethical behaviors which caused the ferry Sewol sinking accident.
					
					 The recent disaster is by no means an accident but a disaster caused by the south Korean society in which the life and safety of the people are disregarded and the unpopular rule holds sway as it pursues only personal luxury and political ambition.
					
					 He expressed full support for the struggle of the south Korean people, saying that the struggle was entirely right as they were strongly demanding traitor Park Geun Hye step down calling for probing the truth behind the disaster and punishing those responsible for it.
					
					 Choe In Thae, principal of Ibaragi Korean primary middle school, said that he was greatly stunned by the ferry sinking accident.
					
					 He said he felt painful when thinking of those students who were  shouting "help!" and their parents wailing over the death of their children.
					
					 He held that the Park regime should be severely punished so that the educators and the students' parents of south Korea might not lose their dear students and children any longer.

articles.title: German Political Party Supports Appeal of 18th Seminar of World Political Parties
articles.content:
German Political Party Supports Appeal of 18th Seminar of World Political Parties
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Germany released a statement on May 16 in support of the appeal made at the 18th seminar of world political parties on building a new society.
					 The Communist Party of Germany entirely supports the appeal to various communist and workers' parties and other progressive parties and people in the world which was adopted at the 18th seminar of world political parties on building a new society, the statement said.
					
					 It recalled that the participants in the seminar unanimously supported the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle for foiling the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK, ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieving the independent reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of independence and Songun.
					
					 All the successes made by socialist Korea would be unthinkable without President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the great sons of the Korean people, it added.
					
					 The Communist Party of Germany, in response to the appeal, decided to hold various political and cultural events and introduce and disseminate the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Accuse U.S., S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Accuse U.S., S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 14 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group for their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 The U.S. and the pro-U.S. group of south Korea are getting evermore frantic in their racket against the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In this regard the spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army released a statement on May 11 condemning the Park Geun Hye group for talking about the "north's involvement in the  drone case" and the U.S. for echoing it.
					
					 The DPRK National Defence Commission in a crucial report and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement of its spokesman on May 13 took a serious note of the remarks made by Kim Min Sok, the spokesman for the south Korean Defense Ministry, malignantly hurting the dignified DPRK, and declared a decisive battle to settle accounts with Park's hooligans.
					
					 Kim Min Sok, a stupid and idiot without an equal in the world, dared talk rubbish that the DPRK "is not worth a country." He went the lengths of letting loose unspeakable outbursts that the "DPRK is a country that should disappear at an early date." 
					
					 The resentment of the service personnel and people of the DPRK at the outrageous hooligans of Park Geun Hye is mounting higher and they are renewing their determination to make a clean sweep of this pro-U.S. group of traitors and reunify the country without fail.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet regime installed by the U.S. that should be brought down as early as possible.
					
					 Genuine peace on the Korean peninsula can be achieved only when the U.S. forces which are illegally present in south Korea and the U.S. colonial servants are swept away from it and Korea is reunified.

articles.title: U.S. Groundless "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Blasted by Brazilian Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Groundless "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Blasted by Brazilian Paper
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Hora do Povo, a newspaper in Brazil, on May 14 carried an article in denunciation of the U.S. groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 The paper denounced the U.S. for perpetrating intervention and acts of aggression against the DPRK and other independent countries under the pretext of "human rights". It blasted the U.S. for working hard to ratchet up the international sanctions against the DPRK while frantically kicking up a campaign against it and for staging ceaseless large-scale joint military exercises in collusion with south Korea.
					
					 The paper went on:
					
					 Peace on the Korean peninsula is preserved thanks to the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense.
					
					 The DPRK is striving to defend socialism and develop all spheres of social life.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK will get it nowhere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia presidida por su secretario general Munkhbat Jamiyan, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion, el visitante dijo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre su partido y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea son las mas solidas y siguen desarrollandose positivamente superando las pruebas de historia.
					
					Anadio que durante su estancia, ha sido testigo presencial de los exitos logrados en Corea y pudo saber bien la diligencia del pueblo coreano y su potencialidad de construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Deseo que bajo la sabia guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en su empeno por lograr la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Comandancia del frente sudoeste expone decision de exterminar a la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Comandancia del frente sudoeste expone decision de exterminar a la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 21 la siguiente informacion abierta:
					Llego al extremo la fiebre provocativa de la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye.
					
					El 20 de mayo, los gangsteres de las fuerzas navales del ejercito titere surcoreano cometieron la grave provocacion militar de  disparar a ciegas con fusiles y canones contra los buques de guerra del EPC, que cumplian la mision de guardia rutinaria en las aguas suroeste de la parte Norte, y los barcos pesqueros pacificos de China.
					
					En particular, esta grave provocacion se ha cometido intencionalmente a sabiendas de que se mueven los buques del EPC para frenar la pesca ilegal de los barcos pesqueros civiles de China en la zona maritima delicada.
					
					No se puede tolerar ni en lo minimo que los gangsteres militares surcoreanos hayan abierto primero el fuego en el Mar Oeste donde la permanente tension militar crea la situacion a punto de explosion.
					
					La gravedad del presente incidente reside en que este coincide con la escalada de incursiones militares en las aguas maritimas de la parte Norte y con el tiro de combate de fusiles y canones que se realiza casi todos los dias en las islas Paekryong, Yonphyong y Taechong.
					
					Tales provocaciones militares, que se ejecutan premeditadamente cuando se han concentrado y reforzado muchos armamentos letales, estan relacionadas con la grave crisis en que cayo la banda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Ahora, la fuerte indignacion del pueblo surcoreano se expresa en las manifestaciones con velas a lo largo del territorio surcoreano en demanda de la "destitucion de Park".
					
					Por otra parte, el circulo militar es criticado duro por la opinion publica por los sucesivos casos de indisciplina del ejercito y por la extrana campana anti-RPDC en que hasta la puerta del bano es descrita como "drone norcoreano".
					
					Para colmo, el disparate de que la RPDC es el "pais que debe ser eliminado" esta causando la guerra total de venganza del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Al incurrir en las provocaciones militares en la zona maritima aguda, los gangsteres militares de Park intentan remediar la fase critica y evitar la gran derrota en las inminentes elecciones locales.
					
					La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC avisa abiertamente a la banda militar de Park Geun-hye los siguientes puntos:
					
					1. A partir de este momento, los buques de guerra de diferentes tamanos de las fuerzas navales del ejercito titere surcoreano, que se muevan a sus caprichos en la candente zona maritima del frente sudoeste, seran blancos de golpe a punteria directa de todos los medios de fuego de nuestra comandancia.
					
					Los buques de guerra surcoreanos, que navegan a sus caprichos a la instigacion directa de los gangsteres del circulo militar, son el factor de provocacion militar que agrava artificialmente la situacion de la zona maritima candente y por lo tanto, resultan los blancos de golpe fisico que deben ser aniquilados sin falta.
					
					2. Tan pronto como se captara cualquier minima provocacion en la linea de guardia maritima del EPC y en los alrededores de 5 islas del Mar Oeste, no se hara esperar el ataque militar sin advertencia previa.
					
					Detener de antemano el primer disparo, climax del enfrentamiento fratricida, es la mayor prioridad para garantizar la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					3. Anunciamos francamente al mundo que estamos dispuestos a librar el combate decisivo, aunque sea ahora mismo, con los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano si ellos lo quieren.
					
					Es decir, queremos que ellos acudan a la batalla oficial para decidir la victoria militar definitiva, en lugar de cometer cobardes y mezquinas provocaciones militares en los callejones como ahora.
					
					Esta posicion nuestra se basa en la decision rotunda de exterminar a los maniacos de confrontacion fratricida, enemigos jurados.
					
					Todo el mundo vera no con palabras sino con valientes acciones militares de las fuerzas del frente sudoeste del EPC quien va a desaparecer del territorio y el mar de la patria y quien va a levantarse.

articles.title: CRPP insiste en revelar todos actos criminales de dictadura de "Yusin"
articles.content:
CRPP insiste en revelar todos actos criminales de dictadura de "Yusin"
						
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la Corte Suprema del Sur de Corea declaro la inocencia de los relacionados con el caso del Partido de Estrategia de Liberacion del Sur de Corea, inventado hace varias decadas.
					Este veredicto es otra prueba de cuan absurdos son los incidentes de espias, inventados por la camarilla fascista del pasado, asi subraya el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria en su informacion no.1063 fechada 22  y continua:
					
					El caso mencionado fue uno de los complots fabricados por el traidor Park Chung Hee para mantener su dictadura fascista de "Yusin" (renovacion).
					
					Aunque transcurrieron mas de 30 anos desde el fin tragico de Park, no se ha revelado todavia en el Sur de Corea la verdad de numerosos incidentes de espias, inventados por el "poder" fascista de "Yusin".
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas continuan demencialmente la fabricacion de tales incidentes so pretexto de la "conspiracion para una rebelion" con el fin de justificar el renacimiento de la dictadura fascista y la gobernacion anti-popular y buscar la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					La represion fascista contra los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades progresistas, que se comete bajo la consigna de "purga de fuerzas pro-Norte", supera la dictadura de "Yusin" en su barbaridad.
					
					Aunque la banda titere surcoreana, actualmente en la peor crisis de gobernacion, levanta la ola fascista para mantener su sucia vida, esto adelantara solo su autodestruccion tragica.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores deben esclarecer la verdad de todos los crimenes cometidos por el "poder" dictatorial de "Yusin" y sentenciar duro a las fuerzas conservadoras, causa de todas las calamidades.

articles.title: Conmemoran 60o aniversario de visita de Kim Jong Il a editoriales de la juventud
articles.content:
Conmemoran 60o aniversario de visita de Kim Jong Il a editoriales de la juventud
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Conmemoraron en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el 60o aniversario de la visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a la Editorial de la Juventud Kumsong y la Editora del Periodico Chongnyon Jonwi.
					El Dirigente visito el 22 de mayo del 43 (1954) de la Era Juche la Editorial de la Juventud Kumsong y la Editora del Periodico Minju Chongnyon, actualmente la Editora del Periodico Chongnyon Jonwi, y dio instrucciones que sirven de guia en la construccion de las publicaciones para la poblacion juvenil e infantil.
					
					En particular, aclaro los problemas fundamentales para convertir esas publicaciones en las del lider y del partido, entre otros, editar bien los relatos sobre la infancia y juventud del Presidente Kim Il Sung, publicar los episodios de lucha de los miembros del Cuerpo Infantil Antijapones, etc.
					
					Enseno otros asuntos como divulgar muchos articulos sobre la lucha valiente de los miembros de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y los miembros ejemplares en el estudio y la militancia y resolver el problema de articulos, redaccion y fotos.
					
					Tuvieron lugar el dia 22 los actos de celebracion con la participacion de Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios, periodistas, redactores y empleados de ambas casas editoriales.
